StepData.description: Welcome to The Island! This area will act as our initial Habitat to help train your Chimeras and restore the land.
You can explore the world by using WASD.
Much of the world has been ruined during The Calamity but that has long since passed.
We can start restoring the land and gathering resources by sending your Chimera out on an Expedition.
Let's click on the portal to get started!
We currently only have access to one Expedition, but don't worry I know we'll unlock more with a little hard work!
Let's select one to get started.
On the left side, you can add me to your Expedition Party. Up to 3 Chimeras can go on a single Expedition.
Amazing work! Thanks to your success, we were able to gather the materials needed to restore our first Facility!
Facilities can be used to train individual stats to improve their success rate on Expeditions. Stats also provide hidden additional benefits.
To train a Chimera, we will first need Essence.
This resource is gained by tapping on blue crystals that appear around the Habitat as well as from Essence Expeditions.
Once you have enough, drag me over to the highlighted area to begin my training.
Looks like this next Expedition will give us some Fossils! While you are preparing for this Expedition, pay attention to the recommended traits.
Using Chimeras with recommended traits will significantly increase the chance of success, so be sure to check what the Expedition is looking for!
Recommended traits include elements like Fire, Water, and Grass or stats like Exploration, Stamina, and Wisdom.
Looks like we found some Fossils and supplies to restore the Temple on our last Expedition.
Click on the Temple to see what Chimera you can restore with Fossils.
We've been able to restore part of the Stone Plains thanks to your hard work!
Now that the Habitat has been upgraded, more crystals will appear and their Essence will be worth more.
